About ACCA

The Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) is the global body for professional accountants. ACCA qualification is recognized worldwide and provides comprehensive knowledge in accounting, finance, and business management. With 11 out of 13 exams completed, I'm on track to become a fully qualified ACCA professional, demonstrating expertise in financial reporting, audit, taxation, and strategic business management.
